page.title: 03HAYDON SCHOOL
page.content: Haydon is a mixed comprehensive school situated on Haste Hill.It used to be two grammar schools,but times and school life changed and the two schools merged into one.They are joined by "the Link"_a long corridor which has the staff block in the middle.The rest of the school consists of two 3_storey buildings.68 teachers teach 1080 pupils from 1st to 6th year and there are 8 periods in a day so each day lasts about 7 hours including breaks.There are 6 classes in a year group,each with 30 pupils of mixed ability or in some cases,all of the same ability.We also have 6 tennis courts and a large field.
